name: spiraljs-demo

scripts.copy-sites-demo-deps: npm run copy-sites-demo-js && npm run copy-sites-demo-css && npm run copy-sites-demo-html
scripts.copy-sites-demo-js: cp src/*.js node_modules/spiraljs/dist/spiral.min.js node_modules/spiraljs/dist/spiral.min.js.map docs/sites/demo/ && cp node_modules/d3/index.js docs/sites/demo/d3.js
scripts.predemo: npm run clean && mkdirp docs/sites/demo && mkdirp docs/sites/demo/fonts && mkdirp docs/sites/demo/bootstrap-css
scripts.purge: npm run clean & npm run clean-downloaded

author: Johan Hidding, Mateusz Kuzak, Jurriaan H. Spaaks, Lourens Veen, Faruk Diblen
